titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the All-University Alumni/Alumni Association Records RG.40.1
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-21 14:38:50 -0500.

physdesc.extent: in 1 half manuscript box and 4 flat boxes

did.abstract: The NYU Alumni Association (NYUAA) is the umbrella organization for all University alumni from every NYU school. This collection consists of copies of the New York University Alumni Magazine from 2015-2018.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of copies of the New York University Alumni Magazine from 2015-2018.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The NYU Alumni Association (NYUAA) is the umbrella organization for all University alumni from every NYU school.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact university-archives@nyu.edu.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Dulcy Israel, New York University Alumni Magazine, in June 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.068.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; All-University Alumni/Alumni Association Records; RG 40.1; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning, materials were rehoused in an archival box and folders, and described on the collection-level.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and Colleges -- Alumni and alumnae.
